userId.description: id of the user who created a TODO item

todoId.description: a unique id for an item

createdAt.description: date and time when an item was created

name.description: name of a TODO item (e.g. "Change a light bulb")

dueDate.description: date and time by which an item should be completed

done.description: true if an item was completed, false otherwise

attachmentUrl.description: a URL pointing to an image attached to a TODO item
